853c1f20-e638-435f-beda-bb792866a039.description: Earners of this Broadcom Partner certification have demonstrated their experience in performing advanced installation and configuration activities with a Customer with the Broadcom product indicated. This certification is earned through the submission of an application form that contains proof of at least two prior Customer engagements providing implementation services with the Broadcom product indicated. Resources must first achieve Proven Implementation Professional certification.
853c1f20-e638-435f-beda-bb792866a039.name: Broadcom Partner Certification - Certified Expert - Agile Requirements Designer - Implementation

badge_template_activities.title: Certified Implementation Expert credentials are achieved through the submission of an "Evidence Pack" of customer engagement documentation to a Broadcom Subject Matter Expert, who will evaluate the Partner Resource's proficiency within this capability. A Partner Resource may be a Certified Implementation Expert on more than one Broadcom product.

43f00e2b-3e45-4b95-aebb-bcfd9f61c00b.description: Earners of this certification have demonstrated their capability and experience in performing a Proof of Concept (POC) or Proof of Value (POV) engagement at a Customer site with the Broadcom product indicated. This certification is earned through the successful completion of a third-party proctored exam (70% or higher), OR through the submission of an application form that contains proof of at least two prior Customer engagements providing POC/POV services with the Broadcom product indicated.
43f00e2b-3e45-4b95-aebb-bcfd9f61c00b.name: Broadcom Partner Certification - Certified Expert - Agile Requirements Designer - Pre-Sales

badge_template_activities.title: Certified Pre-Sales Expert credentials can be issued to a Partner resource once Broadcom Proven Pre-Sales Professional certification is attained, AND evidence is submitted of two or more successful Customer engagements performing a Proof-of-Concept or Proof-of-Value engagement with the product.

3803a876-b821-4a7e-9ad9-22cf9cd32264.description: Earners of this Broadcom Partner certification have validated their advanced capability to position and present the indicated Broadcom product to a Customer. 3803a876-b821-4a7e-9ad9-22cf9cd32264.name: Broadcom Partner Certification - Certified Expert - Agile Requirements Designer - Sales

badge_template_activities.title: Certified Sales Expert credentials are achieved through the submission of a video of the Partner resource delivering the Customer Presentation of the product indicated. 1ff3330a-b88f-4cb7-abd7-c20495743f2f.description: The Symantec CloudSOC Administration R2 course is intended for IT professionals who wish to develop the knowledge and skills to deploy and manage Symantec CASB's solution, CloudSOC. This course is intended for users who want to apply Symantec CloudSOC’s capabilities to control Shadow Data and Shadow IT in cloud applications.
1ff3330a-b88f-4cb7-abd7-c20495743f2f.name: Symantec Instructor-led Training (ILT/VA) - Symantec™ CloudSOC Administration R1

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Symantec CloudSOC Administration R1 instructor-led course.

c98b76e8-87ec-4f13-9b14-a3bac4aa1fdc.description: The Cloud Workload Protection Basic Administration Workshop is a 1-day instructor-led course is an introduction to deployment, management and monitoring of the key features offered using the Cloud Workload Protection solution. This workshop is an introduction to Cloud Workload Protection and is designed for students who are new to the solution. Objectives include describing key features, using the Getting Started Wizard, deploying agents, and configuring and managing policies.
c98b76e8-87ec-4f13-9b14-a3bac4aa1fdc.name: Symantec Instructor-led Training (ILT/VA) -Symantec™ Cloud Workload Protection Basic Administration R1 Workshop

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Symantec Cloud Workload Protection Basic Administration R1 Workshop instructor-led course.

caf9c07c-9877-4745-8f5f-b7cd3c4c5bfb.description: The Endpoint Detection and Response 4.1 Administration course is designed for the IT security professional in a Security Operations role. This class covers how to detect, investigate, remediate, and recover from an incident using Symantec Endpoint Detection and Response. This course enables learners to identify evidence of suspicious and malicious activity, search for Indicators of Compromise, block, isolate & remove threats in the environment, and collect forensic information.
caf9c07c-9877-4745-8f5f-b7cd3c4c5bfb.name: Symantec Instructor-led Training (ILT/VA) -Symantec™ Endpoint Detection and Response 4.1 Administration

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Symantec Endpoint Detection and Response 4.1 Administration instructor-led course.

b4a8f495-8e32-4fa8-8ba8-98d583ca4777.description: This 3-day course is designed for network, IT security, and systems administration professionals in a Security Operations position who are tasked with configuring optimum security settings for endpoints protected by Symantec Endpoint Protection 14.2. This class brings context and examples of attacks and tools used by cybercriminals. Objectives include securing endpoints against network and file-based threats, enforcing adaptive security posture and controlling endpoint integrity and compliance.
b4a8f495-8e32-4fa8-8ba8-98d583ca4777.name: Symantec Instructor-led Training (ILT/VA) -Symantec™ Endpoint Protection 14.2 Configure and Protect

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Symantec Endpoint Protection 14.2 Configure and Protect instructor-led course.

1442ade6-7818-4c25-9e0c-2aa7e35a624e.description: This 3-day course is designed for the IT security management professional tasked with troubleshooting SEP14.2. Students learn how to troubleshoot installations, monitor and troubleshoot the SEPM, client-to-SEPM communication, content distribution, client deployments, and protection technologies. The class also covers how to follow Symantec best practices for remediating a virus outbreak, automating functionality with REST APIs, and integrating SEP with 3rd party applications.
1442ade6-7818-4c25-9e0c-2aa7e35a624e.name: Symantec Instructor-led Training (ILT/VA) -Symantec™ Endpoint Protection 14.2 Maintain and Troubleshoot

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Symantec Endpoint Protection 14.2 Maintain and Troubleshoot instructor-led course.

a915e3f1-a154-4773-bbd9-6f5df4a42bdf.description: The Symantec Endpoint Protection 14.2 Plan and Implement course is designed for the network, IT security, and systems administration professional in a Security Operations position tasked with planning and implementing a Symantec Endpoint Protection environment. Objectives include how to architect a SEP Environment, prepare/deliver a successful Symantec Endpoint Installation, build a Disaster Recovery plan for SEPM backups/restores, manage failover and replication, and deploy endpoint clients.
a915e3f1-a154-4773-bbd9-6f5df4a42bdf.name: Symantec Instructor-led Training (ILT/VA) -Symantec™ Endpoint Protection 14.2 Plan and Implement

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Symantec Endpoint Protection 14.2 Plan and Implement instructor-led course.

de6b5146-e3ce-4bce-9e00-9273e1049da5.description: This course is designed for professionals tasked with maintaining and utilizing a Symantec IT Management Suite implementation in their organizations. This two-day, instructor-led, hands-on course teaches the underlying components and methods to troubleshoot the Symantec Management Platform along with the site infrastructure and ITMS solutions to keep it operating optimally. Students learn how to define, diagnose and solve common platform and solution issues within the ITMS environment.
de6b5146-e3ce-4bce-9e00-9273e1049da5.name: Symantec Instructor-led Training (ILT/VA) -Symantec™ IT Management Suite 8.1 Diagnostics and Troubleshooting

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Symantec IT Management Suite 8.1 Diagnostics and Troubleshooting instructor-led course.

eebc2b69-fbc6-4ebb-b2da-d21b05cac419.description: The Symantec Security Analytics 8 Admin course is designed for participants who want to learn how to use Symantec Security Analytics to perform various types of network-based monitoring and forensic analysis, including incident-response investigation, increased real-time situational awareness, and continuous monitoring for IoCs and APTs. It is intended for students who wish to master core functions of Security Analytics to perform threat hunting and incident response.
eebc2b69-fbc6-4ebb-b2da-d21b05cac419.name: Symantec Instructor-led Training (ILT/VA) -Symantec™ Security Analytics 8 Administration

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Symantec Security Analytics 8 Administration instructor-led course.

3f4484c3-6d77-453b-89a9-b93ca4a7b871.description: This course is designed for professionals tasked with installing and managing SSLV appliances in a production environment. This two-day, instructor-led, course enables learners to plan, implement, configure and manage SSLV appliances. This course enables learners to describe the need for encrypted traffic management, decide on the best implementation for SSLV in an environment, set up and configure the appliance, integrate into existing PKI, and maintain SSLV for optimum performance.
3f4484c3-6d77-453b-89a9-b93ca4a7b871.name: Symantec Instructor-led Training (ILT/VA) -Symantec™ SSL Visibility 4.3 Administration

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Symantec SSL Visibility 4.3 Administration instructor-led course.

3c89017f-b040-4a74-a4e8-55ddcedfc7a1.description: The Web Security Service Planning, Implementation, and Administration course is a two-day instructor-led course intended for IT professionals who will be planning, installing, configuring or administering the Symantec Web Security Service (WSS). Upon completion, users will be able to describe the architecture, components and process flow of WSS, identify installation, configuration and administration of the core features/products of WSS, and identify key elements for planning a WSS deployment.
3c89017f-b040-4a74-a4e8-55ddcedfc7a1.name: Symantec Instructor-led Training (ILT/VA) -Symantec™ Web Security Service Planning, Implementation, and Administration R1.1

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Web Security Service Planning, Implementation, and Administration R1.1 instructor-led course.

f8bf25c7-2e23-4863-a07a-6a9b1724754f.description: The Symantec Sales Expert Plus (SSE+) program delivers technical sales training and an assessment by product/solution to help Sales SEs and Partner SEs validate their knowledge as a technical sales person for Symantec products.
